params._AVSReward: The total reward for AVS attestation.
params._bridgeFee: The total fee charged to user for bridging.
params._crankGasCost: The estimated gas cost for calling release funds, used to calculate rebate and incentivise users to call.
params._name: The name of the contract. Used for EIP-712 domain construction.
params._version: The version of the contract. Used for EIP-712 domain construction.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

releaseFunds(bytes[],(address,address,ui.details: NOTE: this function is only callable by the owner and always releases the funds to the destination address

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_releaseFunds(bytes).notice: Release funds to the destination address

bridgeRequestWeights(uint256).notice: Tracks the total operator weight attested to a bridge request

nextUserTransferIndexes(address).notice: Stores the transfer index for each user for unique transfer tracking

operatorResponses(address,uint256).notice: Tracks bridge requests that this operator has responded to once to avoid duplications

operatorWeights(address).notice: This is a hack around the fact that we don't have access to the EigenLayer stake registry on non-mainnet networks. Instead we monitor the operator's weights on mainnet and change them here manually using a watcher.

releaseFunds(bytes[],(address,address,ui.notice: Convenience function for releasing funds to the destination address with typed data for ABI construction
